src:
Arsene Wenger Soroti Satu Kelemahan Man City yang Bisa Dieksploitasi Liverpool, Apa Itu?
07 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsene Wenger merasa Manchester City harus berhati-hati ketika menyambangi Liverpool akhir pekan ini. Dia tahu Liverpool punya satu keuntungan dari kelemahan skuad Man City.
Duel panas pekan ke-12 Premier League 2019/20 ini bakal tersaji pada Minggu (10/11/2019) malam WIB. Pertandingan ini diprediksi bakal berpengaruh pada pemburuan gelar juara.
Saat ini, tim asuhan Jurgen Klopp memimpin klasemen sementara dengan 31 poin, unggul 6 poin dari kejaran Man City di peringkat kedua. Alhasil, kedua tim punya misi masing-masing untuk berusaha mengejar kemenangan.
Sebagai mantan pelatih, Wenger paham betul panasnya persaingan dua tim tersebut. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Arsene Wenger Highlights One Man City Weakness That Liverpool Can Exploit, What Is It?
Nov 7 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsene Wenger feels Manchester City must be careful when visiting Liverpool this weekend. He knew Liverpool had one advantage from the weakness of the Man City squad.
Hot duel week 12 of the 2019/20 Premier League will be presented on Sunday (11/10/2019) night WIB. This match is predicted to affect the title race.
Currently, Jurgen Klopp's team leads the standings with 31 points, 6 points ahead of Man City in second place. As a result, both teams have their respective missions to try to pursue victory.
As a former coach, Wenger understood the heat of the competition between the two teams. Read below, Bolaneters!
